the user shall search for the preferred repair facility using vehicle vehicle location and radius in mile
the vehicle data shall include vehicle year make and model
the vehicle location shall include street address city state and zipcode
the system shall resolve the zipcode for the street address city and state if zipcode is unknown
the search radius shall be between 1 and 30 mile
the system shall locate the preferred repair facility with the highest rating for the input criterion

the adjuster shall be able to override the preferred repair facitlity on the estimate assignment
the preferred repair facility shall be returned to the user

the estimator shall search for available recycled part using damaged vehicle part information
the estimator shall search for available recycled part using a list of preferred part supplier
the system shall search for available recycled part for the supplied vehicle part and supplier

the system shall retain the available recycled part and supplier returned from the search
the available recycled part information and their supplier shall be returned to the user

the adjuster shall review the collision estimate
the adjuster shall request a recycled part audit of the collision estimate
the recycled part search result provided to the estimator shall be retrieved by the system
the system shall generate an audit report based on the available recycled part and the collision estimate
the audit report shall include the total number of recycled part used in the estimate
the audit report shall include the number of available recycled part from the original search result
the audit report shall include the percentage of available recycled part used in the estimate
the audit report shall include the total score of the audit which sum the indivual line item
the audit report shall be displayed to the user
the audit report shall be available to other adjuster at later point in time
the user shall select to view the preferred repair facility rating
the current repair facility rating shall be displayed to the user
the system will display a blank set of rating if there are not rating yet defined
the user shall enter new rating based on the audit report
the rating shall be from a scale of 110
the rating shall include category for attempted use of recycled part and actual use of recycled part
the user shall select to save the preferred repair facility rating
the preferred repair facility rating shall be saved by the system

the product shall simulate the look of ship at sea
the product shall display the grid within a circle a a view from a periscope
the product shall display each type of ship in a grid using an image of the specific type of ship
when the offensive player take a shot the product shall simulate the sound of a ship at sea
when a shot is marked a a miss the product shall simulate the sound of a shot missing it target
when a shot is marked a a hit the product shall simulate the sound of a shot hitting it target
when a ship is sunk the product shall simulate the sound of a sinking ship
the product shall be available 24 hour per day seven day per week
the product shall able to handle a large number of game simultaneously
the response time shall be no more than 2 second for 95 percent of response and no more than 4 percent for the remaining response
the product shall provide player no access to information that might reveal the identity of another player
nine out ten user shall be able to successfully complete a game with no training
the product shall be available to player who understand english spanish and french
the product shall provide player no access to information that might reveal the identity of another player
the response time shall be fast enough to maintain the flow of the game
the product shall maintain a list of player
the product shall allow a user to identify himself or herself a a player
once a game ha been initiated the product shall make the player assigned to the game unavailable for selection from the list of player
the product shall allow a user to remove himself or herself from the list of player at any time
the product shall make inactive player unavailable for selection from the list of player
the product shall remove player who have been inactive for 24 hour from the list of player
the product shall allow a player to initiate a game by selecting another available player from the list of player
once a game is initiated the product shall display a defensive grid to each player
once a game is initiated the product shall display an offensive grid to each player
the product shall prevent a player from viewing the offensive or defensive grid of the other player
once a game is initiated the product shall allow each player to position their 5 ship on their respective defensive grid
the product shall allow a player to position ship horizontally on their grid
the product shall allow the player to position ship vertically on their grid
the product shall allow the player to position ship diagonally on their grid
the product shall prevent the player from overlapping ship on their grid
when both player have positioned their ship the product shall define the status of each player
for each turn the product shall identify one player a offensive status and one player a defensive status
the product shall maintain the status of each player for a turn either offensive or defensive
at the start of each turn the product shall notify each player of his or her status
for each turn the product shall allow the offensive player to define a shot
for each shot the product shall examine the defensive grid of the defensive player to determine whether the shot wa a hit or miss
for each shot the product shall notify the player whether the shot wa a hit or miss
for each shot the product shall mark the shot a a hit or miss on the defensive grid of the defensive player
for each shot the product shall mark the shot a a hit or miss on the offensive grid of the offensive player
when the hit result in sinking a ship the product shall notify the player that the ship wa sunk
when the hit result in sinking a ship the product shall mark the ship a sunk on the defensive grid of the defensive player
when the hit result in sinking a ship the product shall indicate the type of ship sunk on the defensive grid of the defensive player
when the hit result in sinking a ship the product shall mark the ship a sunk on the offensive grid of the offensive player
if the shot wa marked a a hit the product shall allow the offensive player to define a shot
if the shot wa marked a a miss the product shall change the status of the offensive player to defensive
if the shot wa marked a a miss the product shall change the status of the defensive player to offensive
the product shall continue to assign turn until the game is ended
the product shall end a game when a hit by the offensive player result in sinking the last of the defensive player ’ s ship
the product shall allow a player to end a game at any time during the game
when a game is ended the product shall notify the player that the game is ended
the notification of the game ending will include the reason the game is ended
when a game is ended the product shall allow each player to identify himself or herself a an available player in the list of player
when a game is ended the product shall allow each player to remove himself or herself from the list of player
caller and supervisor must be able to accomplish any system task within 2 minute
caller and supervisor shall learn how to use the system within 10 minute
the system shall be fast and responsive
on a 56k connection the system response time for all operation must be no more than 6 second 90 percent of the time
on a 112k connection or faster the system response time for all operation must be no more than 3 second 90 percent of the time
the system must be available for use between 1200am and 600pm all day of the year
the product shall be internet browser independent
the product shall ensure that only supervisor can advertise empty time slot
the product shall ensure that only supervisor can enter a caller ’ s schedule
the product shall ensure that only supervisor can view schedule of all caller
in the interface and usability survey 90 percent of beta tester must report that the interface is adequately simple
in the interface and usability survey 80 percent of beta tester must report that the interface is appealing
the product shall provide gui based monitoring service for system administrator
the product shall comply with city of chicago application development guide framework
the product shall be easy for system administrator and dba to use after two week of usage
the product shall help the system administrator and dba to resolve transaction error 99 percent of the time
the product shall help system administrator to analyze the transaction with adhoc reporting and kpis
the product shall provide asynchronous messaging to enable parallel processing and reduce the overhead in communication
the product shall provide multithreading technology a well a load balancing to overcome data load spike and traffic
the product shall have a maximum message processing time of 2 second
the product shall poll the system for new message at a maximum of every 1 second
the product shall support transparent resource addition to provide scalability and avoid service interruption of more than 1 day
the product shall be available 9999 percent of the time for regular business day
the product shall have fault avoidance based on standard adoption
the product shall have fault tolerance by using recovery technique compensatory transaction and routing around failure
the product shall process minimum of 1 million transaction per year
the product shall enable access to any type of development environment and platform
the product shall exchange message between csr and eam on a real time basis without any direct interface between two system
the product shall continue to operate during upgrade change or new resource addition
the product will have a new major feature introduced every six month and quarterly maintenance release every six month
the product shall accommodate any new technology without any change in it architecture
the product shall provide authentication and authorization
the product shall enable privacy by encryption wssecurity and integrity checking
the product shall store message for a minimum of one year for audit and transaction tracking purpose
the interface must have one ibm logo and one ccr logo
the system shall use ibm and ccr branding standard
the system shall be displayable on any work computer a ccr user may have
the system must use the same nomenclature used in the existing wcs system and report
every report type must have at least one high level summary shown in the result dashboard
100 percent of all selection and navigation functionality must be able to be activated/selected by either a mouse or a keyboard
the interface should adhere to ibm usability standard
report must be generated within one button click and exported within one button click after selection
after one use a user should understand and remember 90 percent of the system usage and navigation
one training session will be held for 100 percent of ccr user before system deployment
all interface and report will undergo usability test by ccr user
the wcs system shall have the ability to connect other designated wcs database currently not included in the system
the wcs system shall have the ability to include data for region outside the united state
the wcs system shall be run in a window environment
the wcs system must run query to the wcs database once again to update the available data available to ccr user
all change update and addition to the wcs system shall be updated in the wcs developer and wcs user guide
user must be authenticated using their ibm intranet user name and password
cooky containing login information about a user will not be stored on a user ’ s computer
each team owner will need to use a username and password in order to be authenticated to reach the team owner ’ s page
the commissioner will be the only authorized user per league to adjust league setting
each page shall contain a navigation menu which show the index into which the current page is contained
each page shall contain a similar format with action item in one location and navigation button in a different location
the message in the main board will contain up to the first 150 character of the message
a new user shall be able to navigate through the league and team page within 30 second of reaching the startup page
user shall be able to reach the player page with one click from the team owner ’ s page
user shall be able to view at least 25 nfl player statistic and point on each page
the application shall ask the user to confirm dropping a player or trading a player before performing the action
the application shall be able to complete every user transaction within one fourth of a second of receiving the request
the application shall have a downtime of at most 10 minute per year
the application shall run on a web application server
a primary database will be used to store cached data for active user
a secondary database will be used to store historical statistic and data
application update shall occur between 3am and 6 am cst on wednesday morning during the middle of the nfl season
new system version release shall be released at the beginning of each nfl season
2 percent of the time the system will become available within 1 hour of the time that the situation is reported
98 percent of the user workstation shall meet the minimum hardware requirement prior to implementation
98 percent of the user workstation shall meet the minimum software requirement prior to implementation
the rf system should be able to easily interface with the bdw environment in order to load the data
change to revenue and expense formula must be applied to the rf system every year prior to the budgeting process start
100 percent of the entity available a of october monthend will be loaded into the rf system prior to the budget start process
only authorized user shall access the rf system
user access should be limited to the permission granted to their role
the product must comply with the intranet page standard and requirement of enet security
the intranet page should display appropriately in all resolution from 800x600 and higher
with a week of training prior to product implementation 98 percent of the user shall complete their budget within the stipulated time
the product interface should be fast
